item.title: Counting Word Frequencies in One Line
item.description:
cat book.txt | tr -d [:punct:] | tr [:upper:] [:lower:] | tr -d '\r' | tr ' ' '\n' | sed -e '/^$/d' | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr | cut -c9- > book-wordfreq.txt
  • remove punctuations
  • convert to lower cases
  • remove \r from `\r\n’
  • one word per line
  • remove empty lines
  • sort and count unique words
  • sort by freqency in descending order
  • trim the frequency column
